unable to move freely/difficult to get about

sentences.english: Time is not on our side. We need to keep moving forward and we need to move fast.
sentences.chinese: 時不我待，我們必須不斷前進，行動迅速。

sentences.english: Shen Cheng is a project official with the animal-protection group ACTAsia.
sentences.chinese: 沈成，動物保護組織“行動亞洲”項目官員。

sentences.english: The onus now is on the government of Pakistan to act with sincerity.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦政府現在有責任採取有誠意的行動。

sentences.english: It's like having an array of stomp boxes ready for action.
sentences.chinese: 它有一個數組的單塊效果器隨時準備採取相應的行動。

sentences.english: The point of our pacification operations was always described as "winning the hearts and minds" of the people.
sentences.chinese: 我們綏靖行動的意義過去一貫被描寫爲“深得人心。”

sentences.english: His actions led to a death sentence, which was later commuted to a prison term.
sentences.chinese: 郗浩良的行動導致被判處死刑，後來減爲有期徒刑。

sentences.english: Drache to confidential action content, therefore has not to clarify in this matter.
sentences.chinese: 卓凱爲了保密行動內容，故一直沒有就此事作出澄清。

sentences.english: The dense forest screened the guerrillas' movements.
sentences.chinese: 密林掩護了游擊隊員的行動。

sentences.english: Bokova that media facilities should not be the target of military operations.
sentences.chinese: 博科娃指出，媒體設施不應當成爲軍事行動的目標。

sentences.english: A solo violin carried the theme in “The Fixer”;
sentences.chinese: 在《暗影行動》中，主題曲由小提琴獨奏出。

sentences.english: Each side tries to anticipate the actions of the other.
sentences.chinese: 每一方都試圖預測另一方的行動。

sentences.english: Don't give me any lip service. I want to see some action!
sentences.chinese: 別對我說好聽的，我要見你的行動。

sentences.english: Be gentle when washing your face and hair or using cosmetics.
sentences.chinese: 洗臉，梳頭和用化妝品時，行動要柔柔等。

sentences.english: And these various feedback mechanisms quickly facilitate jumpstarting the necessary people into action.
sentences.chinese: 這些反饋機制能夠及時協助有關人員迅速採取行動。

sentences.english: So, in order to move fast, we have to stand on giants' shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 因此，爲了行動迅速，我們需要站在巨人的肩膀上。

sentences.english: In order for these techniques to be effective, you have to act on them.
sentences.chinese: 要想讓這些方法變得有效，你必須據此採取行動。
